document.full_text: a malaysian judge on monday ordered a sodomy trial involving opposition leader anwar ibrahim to proceed, setting the stage for a lengthy trial that could boost prime minister najib razak's government ahead of a possible snap election this year.
document.title: malaysia court rules sodomy case against anwar to proceed
lines_and_colors: a malaysian judge on monday ordered a sodomy trial involving opposition leader anwar ibrahim to proceed, setting the stage for a lengthy trial that could boost prime minister najib razak's government ahead of a possible snap election this year.
